summary: FAILURE OF PARKING BRAKE AT 25,000 MILES.  BRAKE SHOE DROPPED INTO DRUM WEARING DRUM OUT.  SHOES WERE STILL INTACT.  COST TO ME WAS $450.00 AND DENIAL OF DEALER OF ANY DEFECTS IN SYSTEM.  DEALER CLAIMED DAMAGE WAS DONE DUE TO DRIVING WITH EMERGENCY BRAKE ON.  LOUD BELL SOUNDS IF VEHICLE IS MOVED WITH BRAKE ON.  NO ONE WOULD DRIVE WITH BELL SOUNDING.
